entry.def: You use everyone or everybody to refer to all the people in a particular group.
entry.tran: （某个群体中的）每个人，所有人

example.ex: Everyone in the street was shocked when they heard the news...
example.tran: 听到那条消息，街上所有的人都震惊了。

example.ex: When everyone else goes home around 5 p.m. Lynn is still hard at work...
example.tran: 当其他所有人都在晚上5点左右回家时，林恩仍在努力工作。

entry.def: You use everyone or everybody to refer to all people.

example.ex: Everyone feels like a failure at times...
example.tran: 人们有时会觉得自己是个失败者。

example.ex: Everyone needs some free time for rest and relaxation...
example.tran: 每个人都需要一些休息和放松的自由时间。

Sentence.sentence: Perhaps a new phrase is needed, one that can bring everyone one big step closer to realizing Du Bois's original, idealistic hope: It's not the name—it's the Thing that counts..
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Medicare could save hundreds of millions of dollars a year if everyone used the cheaper drug, Avastin, instead of the costlier one, Lucentis.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The conception that everyone has a right to an education appropriate to his potential is a highly democratic and compassionate standard, says Marven Breselor, a professor at Princeton University.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: His logic: companies that embrace automation might use fewer workers, but that's still better than firing everyone and moving the work overseas.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: They came up with 10 or 15 names, and that group of stars was compared with everyone else.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: It looks like everyone in town came to the mall today
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: I know these are tide times," she added, "but everyone agrees on the importance of safeguarding our employees and members of the public who come into the building.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Everyone is looking for a good investment these days.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: There is this 'detachment' and I realize that there are obviously experiences which would overwhelm everyone.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: "Nearly everyone I know is addicted in some measure to the Internet," wrote Tony Schwartz in New York times.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: But surely everyone reading this has had times when you lie in bed for hours, unable to fall asleep because your brain is thinking about work.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: But this does not apply to everyone, so it is essential to establish your own rhythm.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: CucinTech was a company who were very much following the pack, doing what everyone else was doing, and getting rapidly left behind.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Now, just about everyone has a smartphone, connected to the internet almost everywhere almost all the time.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Perhaps a new phrase is needed, one that can bring everyone one big step closer to realizing Du Bois' original, idealistic hope: "It's not the name — It's the Thing that counts. "
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Seeing others enjoy a smoke, or sneak a quick glance, is too tempting to resist and soon everyone is doing it.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: similar studies tested whether students learned basic physics and chemistry concepts better by reading plain text or viewing pictures to and everyone do better with the help of pictures.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: So, instead of innovation for innovation's sake and new products being created simply because the technology is there, the company culture must switch from these point-in-time innovations to a continuous pipeline of innovations from everywhere and everyon
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: That is the fact that not everyone is British, not everyone speaks English and not everyone does business in a British way.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Then names of African-American leaders and heroes are called out, and everyone reflects upon the great things these people did.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: There's little doubt that nearly everyone who comes in contact with the Net has difficulty disconnecting.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Those are the questions we need to ask ourselves, and everyone can have a different answer.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: We really need to get everyone on board.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: When an exhausted student goes to school, he risks hurting everyone on the road with his impaired driving; he doesn't have the cognitive resources to do well on his English test; he has lower self-control with his friends; and at home, he is moody with hi
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: When we're too collaborative, we want everyone to agree with a decision before we proceed.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

stems_affixes.word_buile: lone[adj.孤独的, 独立的]+ly表形容词→adj.孤独的,寂寞的
one一+ly表形容词→adj.唯一的, 单独的
lonely孤独的,寂寞的+ness表名词→n.孤独, 寂寞

stems_affixes.value_cn: 一次, 从前, 曾经

Sentence.sentence: After all, not everyone has realized that wildlife has thoughts, feelings, and most importantly, equal rights to survive.

Sentence.sentence: And in modern day consumer society everyone is considered to be middle class.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语广东卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: By following the basic rules of respecting others, taking care of what belongs to you, and taking pride in the appearance of the neighborhood in general, you will quickly become a good neighbor that everyone appreciates.

Sentence.sentence: Everyone enjoys the life-saving benefits vaccines provide, but they'll exist only as long as everyone shares in the risks.

Sentence.sentence: Everyone has taken a not-so-great class at one time or another.

Sentence.sentence: Everyone in our office is invited.

Sentence.sentence: Everyone is supposed to put books back to the shelves when the closing bell is sounded.

Sentence.sentence: Everyone knew I could not read.

Sentence.sentence: Everyone knows that fish is good for health.

Sentence.sentence: Group exercise is challenging, yet fun and empowering! of course everyone knows that exercise is good for the body.

Sentence.sentence: Hello everyone! I'm very happy to be invited to this program today.

Sentence.sentence: Here are a few tips to help you win over everyone in the neighborhood quickly.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: I believe you will have a wonderful time here once you get to know everyone else.

Sentence.sentence: I sent letters to everyone I knew, telling them about my project.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语天津卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: I think that living in an area where everyone was just like me would quickly become dull.
Sentence.come: 2014年高考英语全国卷1 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: If everyone is giving you the same answer, you won't be able to use it.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: In this instance, step away from your keyboard to allow everyone to calm down.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: It must be true that sooner or later, everyone finds his or her way back to nature.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: Just as in a game of tug-of-war, whenever a person is added, everyone else pulls the rope with less force.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: Not everyone acts the same in response to events, and that is why what triggers one person may or may not trigger another.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: Not everyone knows clearly how to build personal savings, but a savings plan started on a website has helped many put away a nice tidy sum.

Sentence.sentence: Pretty much everyone you know acts differently.

Sentence.sentence: Send a short notice to everyone.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读A 选项

Sentence.sentence: She also operates a website, where she shares her tips and recipes, with the goal of demonstrating that everyone has the ability to control what's on their plate.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖北卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: She pushed her way to the driver and took the suitcase thankfully, everyone on the bus began talking about what the boy had done, and the crowd of strangers suddenly became friendly to one another.

Sentence.sentence: Theory y is the view that everyone has the potential to find satisfaction in work.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语上海卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: There was a bit of me that didn't want to love this when everyone else on the planet did but the horror story is brilliant.

Sentence.sentence: This is how everyone learned to read.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: This joyful show will please everyone, from the youngest to the oldest.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: This means that when they don't know a word, they are going to make a mistake, right in front of everyone.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: Tony higgins from UCAS said that the statistics are good news for everyone in higher education.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: We're not saying that everyone needs to contribute their lives to the poor.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语四川卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: When berlin restaurant customers ate in darkness, they couldn't tell how much they'd had: those given extra-large shares ate more than everyone else, but were none the wiser—they didn't feel fuller, and they were just as ready for dessert.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: When everyone else in the class was focusing on tasks, I could not.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语重庆卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: When some refuse vaccination and seek a free ride, immunity breaks down and everyone is in even bigger danger.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: When vaccination rates are very high, as they still are in the nation as a whole, everyone is protected.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: You can fool everyone else, but you cannot "fool the chickens," because in the end, you will find out, as the saying goes, "What goes around comes around."
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语浙江卷（10月） 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: The supposed importance of influentials derives from a plausible sounding but largely untested theory called the “two step flow of communication”: Information flows from the media to the influentials and from them to everyone else.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: As the cost to everyone else has become clearer, politicians have begun to clamp down.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A century ago Octavia Hill launched the National Trust not to rescue stylish houses but to save“the beauty of natural places for everyone forever”.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: There is no reason why everyone cannot be welcomed on Mauna Kea to embrace their cultural heritage and to study the stars.Robert F.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Now comes word that everyone involved---Democrats, Republicans, the Postal Service, the unions and the system's heaviest users --as finally agreed on a plan to fix the system.
Sentence.come: 出自-2018年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: After all, if everyone you know is going to college in the fall, it seems silly to stay back a year, doesn't it?
Sentence.come: 2017年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Almost everyone who was interviewed for this special report said that the biggest problem at the moment is not a lack of demand but a lack of good work to sell.
Sentence.come: 2010年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: But this seems to be the irony of office speak:  Everyone makes fun of it, but managers love it, companies depend on it, and  regular people willingly absorb it.
Sentence.come: 2015年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Everyone around us seems to agree by the way they cling to their phones, even without a signal on a subway.
Sentence.come: 2015年考研真题（英语二）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: Everyone says this, but it really is a top tip for frugal eaters.
Sentence.come: 2013年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Is it possible to like everyone in your office?
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Not everyone buys the win-win rhetoric.
Sentence.come: 2016年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Not everyone was convinced by such bombast.
Sentence.come: 2012年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Not everyone will agree with the authors'policy ideas, which range from mandating more holiday time to reducing tax incentives for American home buyers.
Sentence.come: 2014年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Now comes word that everyone involved—Democrats, Republicans, the Postal Service, the unions and the system's heaviest users—has finally agreed on a plan to fix the system.
Sentence.come: 2018年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: The supposed importance of influentials derives from a plausible-sounding but largely untested theory called the"two-step flow of communication": Information flows from the media to the influentials and from them to everyone else.
Sentence.come: 2010年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: There is no reason why everyone cannot be welcomed on Mauna Kea to embrace their cultural heritage and to study the stars.
Sentence.come: 2017年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Therefore, everyone needs to find their extra—their unique value contribution that makes them stand out in whatever is their field of employment.
Sentence.come: 2013年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: There's always a constant fear of falling behind everyone else on the socially perpetuated "race to the finish line," whether that be toward graduate school, medical school or a lucrative career.
Sentence.come: 2017年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: This allows the TSA to focus on travelers who are higher risk, saving time for everyone involved.
Sentence.come: 2017年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

means.word_mean: 每人, 人人, 各人,所有人

sentences.en: Everyone knows it.
sentences.cn: 大家都知道这件事。

sentences.en: Everyone knows what they have to do, don't they?
sentences.cn: 每一个人都知道他们必须干什么, 不是吗?

sentences.en: Everyone is not present.
sentences.cn: 并非每个人都来了。</seg>
人人都携伴参加聚会。
sentences.en: Everyone brought their partner to the party.

sentences.cn: 个个人都携伴参加聚会。
sentences.en: (formal)Everyone brought his or her partner to the party.

sentences.cn: 警方盘问了房间里的每一个人。
sentences.en: The police questioned everyone in the room.

sentences.cn: 老师对每个人的作业都作了讲评。
sentences.en: The teacher commented on everyone's work.

sentences.cn: 其他所有人都在那儿。
sentences.en: Everyone else was there.

sentences.cn: 人人都鼓掌欢呼。
sentences.en: Everyone cheered and clapped.

sentences.cn: 每个人都有机会赢。
sentences.en: Everyone has a chance to win.

sentences.cn: 当其他所有人都在晚上5点左右回家时，林恩仍在努力工作。
sentences.en: When everyone else goes home around 5 p.m. Lynn is still hard at work...

sentences.cn: 人们有时会觉得自己是个失败者。
sentences.en: Everyone feels like a failure at times...

sentences.cn: 每个人都需要一些休息和放松的自由时间。
sentences.en: Everyone needs some free time for rest and relaxation...

sentences.cn: 听到那条消息，街上所有的人都震惊了。
sentences.en: Everyone in the street was shocked when they heard the news...

sentences.cn: 她请他在她的西部片《致命快枪手》中扮演角色.
sentences.en: She had him cast in her Western movie The Quick and the Dead.

sentences.cn: 就在枪声传来的时候, 大伙都躺倒在地.
sentences.en: When the shots rang out, everyone hit the deck.

sentences.cn: 他的到职为大家所欢迎.
sentences.en: His assumption of office was welcomed by everyone.

sentences.cn: 我带了一副可怕的面具,使大家受惊了.
sentences.en: I surprised everyone by wearing a terrible mask.

sentences.cn: 这事已传开——谁都知道了.
sentences.en: The story has got around — everyone knows about it.

sentences.cn: 每个人都帮了忙, 所以工作提前完成了.
sentences.en: Everyone lent a hand, so that the work was finished ahead of schedule.

sentences.cn: 谁都应该守法.
sentences.en: Everyone should observe the law.

sentences.cn: 大家在致县委会的请愿书上签了名,要求在我们村里办一所新学校.
sentences.en: Everyone signed the petition to the County Council for a new school in our village.

sentences.cn: 他远离大家隐居着.
sentences.en: He lives in retirement, away from everyone.

sentences.cn: 不管大家怎么劝说, 他高低不听.
sentences.en: No matter how hard everyone tried to persuade him , he just wouldn't listen.

sentences.cn: 这就像一个英国政府滑稽剧:我被从一个部门打发到另一个部门,每个人都说帮助我是他人的事.
sentences.en: It was like a Whitehall farce the way I was sent from department to department and everyone said it was someone else's job to help me.

sentences.cn: 不把办公室里的每个人弄得心烦意乱他就不会满足.
sentences.en: He won't be contented until he's upset everyone in the office.

sentences.cn: 人人称颂他的崇高品德.
sentences.en: Everyone extols his noble qualities.

sentences.cn: 当时是圣诞节,每个人都沉浸在节日的欢乐中.
sentences.en: It was Christmas and everyone was in festive mood.

sentences.cn: 她对每一个人都和蔼可亲.
sentences.en: She is affable to everyone.

sentences.cn: 死亡对每个人都一视同仁, 它会降临到每个人的身上.
sentences.en: Death does not discriminate; it comes to everyone.

sentences.cn: 餐桌上每人给了一副刀叉.
sentences.en: Everyone at the table was given a knife and fork.

sentences.cn: 她将蛋糕切成多块, 每人可得一份.
sentences.en: She portioned out the cake, so everyone had a piece.

sentences.cn: 这儿有一条不成文法,即每人自己去取咖啡, 哪怕是经理也是如此.
sentences.en: It's an unwritten law around here that everyone fetches his own coffee, even the managers.

sentences.cn: 他以一种每人都能理解他意图的方式说出他的理由.
sentences.en: He put his argument in a way that everyone could understand his intentions.

sentences.cn: 每人都应负责(包括我自己).
sentences.en: Everyone, not excepting myself has the responsibility.

sentences.cn: 他们坚决要求每人都要来参加晚会.
sentences.en: They insisted that everyone should come to the party.

sentences.cn: 每人都应注意保护视力.
sentences.en: Everyone should pay attention to preserving his own eyesight.

sentences.cn: 每人都有一些问题要去解决.
sentences.en: Everyone has his problem to tackle.

sentences.cn: 我们每人都会犯错, 如何把错误改正过来才是重点.
sentences.en: Everyone of us is fallible. How to rectify our errors is the main point.

sentences.cn: 直到每人坐好了,会议才开始.
sentences.en: Not untilis everyone seatedthe meeting will begin.

sentences.cn: 每人一个人都应该坚持真理.
sentences.en: Everyone should always adhere to the truth.

sentences.cn: 每人出一英镑给老师合买了一份结婚礼物.
sentences.en: Everyone chipped a pound in to buy our teacher a wedding present.

sentences.cn: 我们发给每人一张列有携带适当服装的单子, 等等.
sentences.en: We give everyone a list of suitable clothes, etc.

sentences.cn: 怕你受委屈时每人替你抱不平.
sentences.en: Afraid of everyone for you when you are wronged against injustice.

sentences.cn: 请给每人发一支铅笔.
sentences.en: Please issue everyone with a pencil.

sentences.cn: 据说每人都有一个守卫天使.
sentences.en: It is said that everyone has a guardian angel.

sentences.cn: 领座员给每人一份夜场演出的节目单.
sentences.en: The ushers gave everyone a program for the evening performance.

sentences.cn: 每人都为自己争得利益,让鬼拿最后一份吧.
sentences.en: Everyone for himself and let the devil take the hindmost.

sentences.cn: 每人都有自己的长处和短处.
sentences.en: Everyone has his own strong and weak points.

sentences.cn: 每人都要八点钟上班签到.
sentences.en: Everyone has to check in at the office by eight o'colck.

sentences.cn: 在你的通讯录里对每人把这个警告传送下去!
sentences.en: Pass this warning along to EVERYONE in your address book!

sentences.cn: 她把每人都逗得忍不住大笑.
sentences.en: She had everyone in stitches.

sentences.cn: 如果每人凑钱,我们就能为她买点相当不错的东西.
sentences.en: If everyone chips in we could get her something really nice.

sentences.cn: 帮战完了每人发奖金!
sentences.en: Everyone will have bonus after the gang war!

sentences.cn: 当他们到达舞会会场时,我们给他们每人一杯水果饮料.
sentences.en: Let's give everyone a fruit punch when they arrive at the party.

sentences.cn: 每人可以选一本好的小说.
sentences.en: Everyone can opt for a good novel.

sentences.cn: 而我亦回赠每人一双运动鞋和羽绒服.
sentences.en: I in return gave everyone a pair of sports shoes and a jacket.

sentences.cn: 要求每人都要出席这个讲座.
sentences.en: Everyone is required to be at the lecture.

sentences.cn: 每人在吃晚饭时都很愉快.
sentences.en: Everyone had a good time at dinner.

sentences.cn: 除开不诚实的人外, 任何诚实的人都能获患上蜂蜜, 每人都恁地想.
sentences.en: Except dishonest ones, anyone who is honest can get honey, everyone thellonks so.

sentences.cn: 人人都携伴参加聚会。
sentences.en: Everyone brought their partner to the party.

sentences.cn: 人人都鼓掌欢呼。
sentences.en: Everyone cheered and clapped.

sentences.cn: 因此，人人都需要发现自身的附加值，即能够让自己在各种工作领域中脱颍而出的特殊价值贡献。
sentences.en: Therefore, everyone needs to find their extra—their unique value contribution that makes them stand out in whatever is their field of employment.

sentences.cn: 我以为人人都会游泳.
sentences.en: I thought everyone knew how to swim.

sentences.cn: 人人都赞美他这种见义勇为的精神.
sentences.en: Everyone admires his spirit of doing boldly what is righteous.

sentences.cn: 别理会投资时尚. 人人都做的事情并不见得就是对的.
sentences.en: Ignore the investment fads. The fact that everyone else is doing it doesn't make it right.

sentences.cn: 那种孩子人人喜爱.
sentences.en: That sort of boy is loved by everyone.

sentences.cn: 当然, 不是人人都能领会的, 因为我们常常用一些象征性或深奥的语言.
sentences.en: Of course, not everyone can understand it, since we often employ a symbolic or esoteric language.

sentences.cn: 人人都承认这人的头脑顶呱呱.
sentences.en: Everyone agreed that the man had a master intellect.

sentences.cn: 耶, 人人都爱渲染3D图形.
sentences.en: Ah yes, everyone loves rendering 3 D graphics.

sentences.cn: 他使用扩音器,使人人能听见他的讲话.
sentences.en: He used a microphone so that everyone could hear him.

sentences.cn: 当员工听说要定期裁员时, 人人都同样地感到受威胁.
sentences.en: When workers think a periodic purge is imminent, everyone feels equally threatened.

sentences.cn: 数学考试班上人人都及格了.
sentences.en: Everyone in the class passed the maths exam.

sentences.cn: 最理想的是, 人人都能有平等的机会.
sentences.en: Ideally, everyone would is given equal opportunities.

sentences.cn: 这类人就像骑自行车, 几乎人人都有至少一段做这种人的经历.
sentences.en: This person is like riding a bike, everyone has tried it at least once.

sentences.cn: 一个真正成功的人,必须人人都容得下你,你也能容纳每一个人.
sentences.en: A truly successful person is accepted by everyone and accepts everyone.

sentences.cn: 老年人会知道多些谚语, 但是人人都会在同样的地方用它们.
sentences.en: Older people tend to know a lot of them, but everyone uses them at some point.

sentences.cn: 真理面前,人人平等.
sentences.en: Everyone is equal before the truth.

sentences.cn: 中国最近崛起,连带产生一种新的流行看法: 人人都要学中文.
sentences.en: China's recent rise has brought with it a new conventional wisdom: that everyone must learn Mandarin.

sentences.cn: 人人得有单独的财产所有权以及同他人合有的所有权.
sentences.en: Everyone has the right to own property alone as well as in association with others.

sentences.cn: 但是,当信贷停止在金融市场、银行 、 商业和消费者之间自由流通时,人人都会意识到.
sentences.en: But everyone knows when credIt'stops circulating freely through markets to banks, businesses and consumers.

sentences.cn: 人人都有责任维持环境整洁.
sentences.en: Everyone has a responsibility keep the environment clean.

sentences.cn: 人人都寻找躲避恶劣天气的地方.
sentences.en: Everyone looked for a shelter from the bad weather.

sentences.cn: 人人都对这位年轻的小提琴家的卓越才华感到惊讶.
sentences.en: Everyone marvelled at the young violinist's great brilliance.

sentences.cn: 人人都说他们从来没看到穿得比这更阔气的姑娘.
sentences.en: Everyone said they had never seen a girl more richly dressed.

sentences.cn: 比利: 可是你知道并不是人人都庆祝圣诞节 吗 ?
sentences.en: Billy: You know that not everyone celebrates Xmas though?

sentences.cn: 意外事故很普遍.几乎人人都有过至少一次.
sentences.en: Accidents are so common that everyone has once at least.

sentences.cn: 几乎人人都听说过关于应该成为社会有用的一员的重要性.
sentences.en: But then almost everyone has heard about the need to be a useful member of society.

sentences.cn: 人人都试图从狭窄的门中挤过去.
sentences.en: Everyone was trying to squeeze through a narrow door.

sentences.cn: 公主那时即将成婚, 人人都在首都等待这一盛典.
sentences.en: The princess was getting married, and everyone was in town for the great occasion.
